website_summaries.verdict: The Star Wars Death Star cannot be destroyed, when in the form of this fun magnetic bottle opener.
pros: A decent size for a bottle opener
Magnet keeps the opener handy on the fridge
cons: The magnet is so strong it can make it difficult to get off your fridge to use

customer_reviews.title: Last minute christmas gift worked out well
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get my boss and coworker a holiday gift, but they got me one. So I lied and said I bought them something. This worked great for my boss. He loves Star Wars and for some reason he thinks a paint can opener will also open bottles so this is a nice replacement. Heavy material and opens bottles well, the quality makes it worth the amount you'll pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: kelley

customer_reviews.title: What's to review?
customer_reviews.text: It's a magnet (heavy one) and it opens bottles. It's a good size for a bottle opener (pretty big - about size of an adult's palm). Death Star details look very well done for this metal piece. I do like how the dish is the place to destroy those rebellious bottle caps!
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.Top Contributor: Star Trek

customer_reviews.title: If you're here..
customer_reviews.text: If you are reading this and thinking about buying this. Do it. I can't say you will get the same one I did in terms of quality. But if you do. You may feel this is one of the better purchases you have made on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Casey

customer_reviews.title: it's a hit!
customer_reviews.text: it's a hit in our household! Hubby loves the Death Star bottle opener. It sticks easily to the fridge with the magnet and works just great as a bottle opener, too. Strong magnet and well made Death Star model. A great gift for the Star Wars fan!
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Epic Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bottle opener as a gift for my Star Wars loving brother and he loved it. It is expensive (for a bottle opener) but the metal is sturdy and the magnet is strong so the opener does not slide on the refrigerator. My first impression is that this bottle opener will last forever, and will be passed on to many future generations of Star Wars lovers. An excellent way to display your fandom and have a beer.
customer_reviews.author: Jared&Katie Griebel

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but not good for actually opening bottles.
customer_reviews.text: This is great looking, feels sturdy, made quality, sticks to the fridge well with great magnets. The big problem is that it is kinda terrible at actually opening bottles. I need to work my way around the bottle cap a few times to get it open.
customer_reviews.author: Fried Turkey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Opener - Regardless if you love Star Wars
customer_reviews.text: So my boyfriend was looking for a bottle opener with a magnet for the fridge. It was a double win since he's a Star Wars nut. It does a good job but the real reason I think it deserves 5 stars is because you only need to try once to open the top! Most openers I've used require two pulls to get a cap off and this one easily takes it off in one motion!
customer_reviews.author: KristinaK

customer_reviews.title: It looks and works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is THE Star Wars Death Star magnetic bottle opener. I have seen this product advertised on other sites besides Amazon, and sometimes the photos look slightly different. However, it is all the same product, and this is it. This is not a knock-off. In real life it looks great and works well. I would recommend it to any sci-fi fan.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Inman

customer_reviews.title: Death Star at work
customer_reviews.text: It does what I bought it for, sit attached to my office filing cabinet. Said filing cabinet is steel, and the two magnets are plenty powerful. The only reason this is not 5 stars is it is a bit awkward and I normally have to slide it off the filing cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: The most "borrowed" thing in my house.
customer_reviews.text: By borrowed I mean "accidentally stolen". Best...bottle...opener...ever. EVER. It's got weight, the magnets are strong (too strong according to the wifelady), it looks awesome, guests/friends are always trying to steal it, and it opens my beer on the first go. What else do you need?
customer_reviews.author: The Ben

customer_reviews.title: Impressive. Most impressive.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome magnet! It comes in very attractive packaging and this magnet has some heft to it. I plan on shaking up my next beverage so that I can pretend the spray is the death ray.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Coolest wife ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas and he loves it. He also received the R2D2 but he chose to keep the Death Star instead. These are really high quality bottle openers. Sticks to the fridge really well. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Mc.

customer_reviews.title: Small but cool looking for geeks
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is small, but it looks good on my husband's stainless steel beer fridge. He is happy I got it for him.
customer_reviews.author: yoshika

customer_reviews.title: Great novelty gift.  VERY strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: Great little gift for star wars fan. good quality. surprised by the strength of the magnet. takes some strength to pull off of the refrigerator. Also dangerous if placed near cell phone or computer. Took away one star for unnecessary magnet strength.
customer_reviews.author: momandmore

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle opener!
customer_reviews.text: heavier/sturdier than expected. I bought this for my dad for Christmas, the magnet on it is strong so it holds up the sturdy bottle opener, its an awesome design obviously and it has a convex shape which is also very cool.
customer_reviews.author: CGrace

customer_reviews.title: cool geek toy
customer_reviews.text: The one we got is not silver colored, but has a dark, glossy finish, almost black. The surface is detailed and it is heavy, solid, and smooth. It feels good in the hand. The bottle opener works fine, and the magnets which hold it onto your fridge are strong; it can hold up some coupons or a takeout menu as well as itself. And it looks cool hanging there. We like it.
customer_reviews.author: kmcorby

customer_reviews.title: Beer Bottle opener
customer_reviews.text: This is incredible, it opens coke and beer bottles. It has a couple of magnets that allow me to place it on the fridge and people coming over always comment on it. If you love Star Wars this is an absolute must. I want more of these type things.
customer_reviews.author: N. Brookins

customer_reviews.title: Bad ass
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband as a gift and he loves it. the pic makes it look really light but its actually a very dark grey so it looks really good. its got a pretty good magnet on it so we have our little deathstar on our fridge. its awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a stocking stuffer and we really like it. Good quality, sturdy, strong magnet on the back. I wish the piece that you use to pry with was a tiny bit longer, but it works well as is.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: ... as a Christmas gift for my fiance and he loved it. A bit pricey
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my fiance and he loved it. A bit pricey, but it's good quality, very sturdy. We haven't had any issues opening bottles. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ac_92

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, but not as shown in picture
customer_reviews.text: The bottle opener has nice strong magnets to attach to your fridge and the magnets stick out a bit so the toy is not flush. This makes it easy to press on an edge and grab the other edge to easily pull it off the fridge. It has a nice heft to it. Would be 5 stars if it was as shown in the picture. Instead it is much darker, almost black, as other reviewers have said.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mora

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely fun bottle opener!
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived. It is a bit darker grey that the picture, but it looks very cool. The magnets on the back are very strong, so it won't slide off of the fridge. This was a birthday gift for my boyfriend, and he loves it! I would definitely buy from Diamond Select Toys again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Moynihan

customer_reviews.title: Ya, its cool!
customer_reviews.text: What's there to say, it's friken cool. Has a nice weight to it, magnets are strong and is a quality product. Did I mention its kind of cool and opens beers...
customer_reviews.author: C. Burnett

customer_reviews.title: It's (not) a trap!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, heavy bottle opener with strong magnets to keep it right where you leave it on the fridge! Well worth the price paid!
customer_reviews.author: Fletch

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: not quite as picture displays. Mine is nearly black in color. Otherwise it is fine. Five more words required to submit.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Loche

customer_reviews.title: Perfect opener! Of good material and it is still Magnet.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for me because I'm a fan of the Star Wars saga. However, just giving birthday gift for a good friend who is also a fan of the saga. She loved this and always use at her house, very practical.
customer_reviews.author: Ariadne

customer_reviews.title: Space station?!
customer_reviews.text: That's no moon, it's a bottle opener! A handy dandy bottle opener on my fridge. I lost my old one when I moved, and am very glad that I have it again.
customer_reviews.author: Geran

customer_reviews.title: FUN
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, feels great, not the best bottle opener, still I am glad to have it on the fridge - that's no moon
customer_reviews.author: Gregg E.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great, solid product for the beer drinking Star Wars fan. Strong magnet so it won't fall off or slide down fridge. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: very nice product
customer_reviews.text: made well, fast shipping, thank you! I also bought the star trek enterprise bottle opener, both definitely cool to have around your house.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: It's very sturdy, and has two very strong magnets that hold it on my fridge very well. Opens beer bottles with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Stehle E Harris

customer_reviews.title: The coolest addition to the bar set!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy metal opener. Very recognizable Dealth Star. Opens bottles well. This is a great novelty gift. Exceeds expectation! A little pricey but, fun!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: It is a cool and fun magnet/bottle opener, but overall it is not worth the price i paid (~$25). 3 stars because it works as a bottle opener and looks good, but price is too high. Others mention that the finish is much darker than shown in the picture. This is definitely true but the details can be clearly distinguished.
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend for Christmas and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Not Silver but came in Black
customer_reviews.text: The detail is nice on this, but mine is jet-black not silver, so it makes it hard to see the nice detail. Other than the color, it is a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: LArmstrong

customer_reviews.title: Best friends present
customer_reviews.text: We loved star wars as kids and now we love beer. It works out well. High quality and a great gift idea
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any Star Wars fan, fanatic or casual! Giving this as a Christmas gift and can't wait to see the surprise on my friend's face!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Snyder

customer_reviews.title: The Magnets Fell Off
customer_reviews.text: We've only had this for a few months and it has fallen apart. Maybe you're not supposed to use it as an actual bottle opener?
customer_reviews.author: I hate my mom and dad

customer_reviews.title: This did the job.
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up for a friends Christmas gift last year. Obviously a fan his face was priceless when he opened it. It makes for a great talking piece when mounted on the fridge!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is really a cool gadget. My husband loved it! Even the box it came in was cool! Great for any Star Wars fan. Got it very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Paprock

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a surprisingly high quality item. I thought it might be cheaply built, with thin metal and poor casting, but to my surprise it's both well casted (the Death Star is nicely detailed) and is just the right weight / thickness. Plus, the magnetic backing makes it easy to keep on your fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Roper

product_meta.title: DIAMOND SELECT TOYS Star Wars: Death Star Magnetic Bottle Opener
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
A Diamond Select Release. Designed and Sculpted by Art Asylum. Why settle for some scruffy-looking bottle opener? Cast in solid metal, this Death Star opener features all the detail of the famous Imperial battlestation from Star Wars, but at four" in diameter it fits in the palm of your hand and opens bottles with ease. Plus, a magnet on the back allows it to hang ominously on your refrigerator. The ability to destroy a planet is insignificant next to the power of applied force. Comes packaged in a collector's case with a full-color wrap.
feature_bullets: Designed and sculpted by Art Asylum
Fashioned after the fearsome Imperial battlestation from Star Wars Episode IV
Opens bottles with super laser hole

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars48 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
